ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: When the Messengers came to the family of Lut,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: When the messengers came to the family of Lot,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: So when the envoys came to the household of Lot,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: When the Messengers came to the family of Lot,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And when the sent angels came to the house of Lut.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then when the messengers (the angels) came to the family of Lut
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So when the apostles came to Lut's followers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: So, when the envoys came to the folk of Lot,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And when the messengers came unto the family of Lot,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: When the messengers came to Lot and his family,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then when the sent ones entered unto the household of Lut.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So when the messengers came to Lot’s family,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: At length when the messengers arrived among the adherents of Lut,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then, when the Messengers (the angels) came unto the family of Lout (Lot).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And when the envoys came to the family of Lot,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And when the envoys came to the family of Lot.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And when the messengers came to the family of Lot,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [15:61] And when those who had been sent [by God] came to the family of Lot, that is, to Lot [himself],
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And when the messengers) Gabriel and his helpers (came unto the family of Lot) to Lot,
